article: How to Clean Your Front or Top-Loading Samsung Washer
intro: A clean Samsung washing machine can make or break a laundry day. It helps prevent odors and mold from accumulating while keeping your machine running at its peak performance. Whether you have a front or top-loading washer or you're cleaning the interior or exterior of the machine, you can use the same household products to keep it pristine. Refer to this guide for thorough cleaning instructions.

points.name: Using the Self-Clean Cycle to Remove Mold & Mildew

steps.title: Scrub the pump filter to remove mildew odors in front-loading machines.
steps.subtitle: One hour after the Self-clean cycle, open the pump filter by pressing the cover on the bottom left of the machine. Place a container underneath to capture any water. Hold the hose, twist the cap, and twist the filter counterclockwise. Rinse under warm water and brush off any debris with a brush. Reinsert and twist it clockwise.
sub-points: Wait at least 1 hour before removing the pump filter to avoid a burn injury.
